text: Flex & Shanice was an American reality television series starring Flex Alexander and Shanice Wilson. It premiered on November 1, 2014 on the Oprah Winfrey Network, as part of its Saturday-night reality lineup. ==Episodes== ===Season 1 (2014)=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="width:72%;" |- ! scope="col" style="background-color: #FFCA4A; color: #000000;" width=7% | No. in series ! scope="col" style="background-color: #FFCA4A; color: #000000;" width=7% | No. in season ! scope="col" style="background-color: #FFCA4A; color: #000000;"| Title ! scope="col" style="background-color: #FFCA4A; color: #000000;" width=20% | Original air date ! scope="col" style="background-color: #FFCA4A; color: #000000;" width=20% | U.S. viewers (million) |- |} ===Season 2 (2015)=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="width:72%;" |- ! scope="col" style="background-color: #FF5F5F; color: #000000;" width=7% | No. in series ! scope="col" style="background-color: #FF5F5F; color: #000000;" width=7% | No. in season ! scope="col" style="background-color: #FF5F5F; color: #000000;"| Title ! scope="col" style="background-color: #FF5F5F; color: #000000;" width=20% | Original air date ! scope="col" style="background-color: #FF5F5F; color: #000000;" width=20% | U.S. viewers (million) |- |} ===Season 3 (2016)=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="width:72%;" |- ! scope="col" style="background-color: #7236BB; color: #FFFFFF;" width=7% | No. in series ! scope="col" style="background-color: #7236BB; color: #FFFFFF;" width=7% | No. in season ! scope="col" style="background-color: #7236BB; color: #FFFFFF;"| Title ! scope="col" style="background-color: #7236BB; color: #FFFFFF;" width=20% | Original air date ! scope="col" style="background-color: #7236BB; color: #FFFFFF;" width=20% | U.S. viewers (million) |- |} ==References== Category:2010s American reality television series Category:2014 American television series debuts Category:2016 American television series endings Category:English-language television shows Category:Oprah Winfrey Network original programming
